title: Himi 119
lyrics:
4-6’s & 2-8’s
1.
Ko e tui loto
Ki he ta’ata’a
Na’e lingi ia,
‘I he’eku hia;
Ko hoku ma’u’anga ‘ofa
Fakalaumālie ia.
2.
Pea fakapapau;
‘E he Laumālie;
‘Eku tupu fo’ou,
‘I hoku ‘Otua
Pea u ongo’i ‘i loto,
‘A e fakamolemole.
3.
Pea mole leva,
‘A ‘eku lilika,
Pea u toki ‘ilo,
‘A e loto ‘ofa
Pea u ‘unu’unu atu
Ki he ‘eku Tamai ‘ofa.
4.
Pea u toki ‘ilo,
‘A hoku ‘Otua;
Pea u nekeneka,
‘I he’ene ‘ofa;
Pea u ‘alā Tamai leva,
Ko e foha ohia au. *
